description.title: ERC20: transfer, approve and transfer from using three accounts
description.purpose: Uses three accounts; account1 deploys the OBX ERC20 contract and therefore owns all initial tokens. Account1 transfers some tokens to account2. Account1 then approves account2 for a certain amount of tokens, and account2 then transfers from that approval amount to account3. Account3 then sends all it's tokens back to account1. In this way all three accounts are performing a transaction, and calling to get their balances.
